title: KINEEMA ORB / torque talk
description: Kim has a sweet ride, the Coupris Kineema - the sports version of the Coupris 40 police motor-carriage. You should definitely talk about it.

dialogueTree.title: Interfacing: "Droplets of rain fall on the white-..."
dialogueTree.text: Droplets of rain fall on the white-on-blue police livery of the motor carriage.

links.title: You: "Wait, why am I even thinking about..."
links.text: Wait, why am I even thinking about this? Wasn't I supposed to...

links.title: Interfacing: "... do something important? Somethi..."
links.text: ... do something important? Something murder-related? There's always *something* important. Doesn't mean you can't take a moment to admire this piece of machinery.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "This is a Coupris Kineema, the Coup..."
links.text: This is a Coupris Kineema, the Coupris MotorCorp's follow-up to their highly successful workhorse, Coupris 40, and the answer to the LUM's racing-bred 'Fevre' series.

links.title: Interfacing: "With its air-cooled, rear-mounted t..."
links.text: With its air-cooled, rear-mounted twelve cylinder compression ignition engine driving the rear wheels through a four-speed manual gearbox, the Kineema is able to reach 100 kilometres per hour in 13.5 seconds. And go on to a top speed of 180 kilometres an hour.

links.title: You: "Won't it roll over in the first sha..."
links.text: Won't it roll over in the first sharp corner?

links.title: Interfacing: "The high centre of balance is offse..."
links.text: The high centre of balance is offset by a large battery bank mounted at the bottom of the cabin, feeding all the auxiliary systems and making the Kineema effectively a mobile power plant.

links.title: You: "This tech-talk is really rubbing me..."
links.text: This tech-talk is really rubbing me the right way here.

links.title: Interfacing: "Due to a quite steep price tag it i..."
links.text: Due to a quite steep price tag it is very unusual to see one in police livery.

links.title: You: "Turn your attention to the motor ca..."
links.text: Turn your attention to the motor carriage itself.

links.title: You: "Motor carriages don't interest me...."
links.text: Motor carriages don't interest me. [Finish thought.]

links.title: Coupris Kineema: "Even at a standstill the uni-body C..."
links.text: Even at a standstill the uni-body Coupris Kineema looks sleek and dynamic. The cabin is tilted frontward to give it a more aggressive *hunched* look.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Someone has waxed it recently."
links.text: Someone has waxed it recently.

links.title: You: ""That machine really puts the 'loco..."
links.text: "That machine really puts the 'loco' back in 'locomotion'!" (Point to the vehicle.) "Very cool."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mhmh." The lieutenant smiles ever..."
links.text: "Mhmh." The lieutenant smiles ever so slightly. "You want to take a closer look?"

links.title: You: ""What's it packing there?" (Point t..."
links.text: "What's it packing there?" (Point to the engine.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hundred-and-thirty.""
links.text: "Hundred-and-thirty."

links.title: Interfacing: "I reckon that's a seven-litre V12 t..."
links.text: I reckon that's a seven-litre V12 there.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Man, that's got to be a major advan..."
links.text: Man, that's got to be a major advancement over the KR18GU engine on the old Coupris 40.

links.title: You: ""Wait, hundred-and-thirty what?""
links.text: "Wait, hundred-and-thirty what?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Kilowatts," the lieutenant replies..."
links.text: "Kilowatts," the lieutenant replies laconically.

links.title: You: ""Hundred-and-thirty kilowatts is a..."
links.text: "Hundred-and-thirty kilowatts is a lot of power, Kim."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The Kineema *is* fast. Feels right..."
links.text: "The Kineema *is* fast. Feels right at home on the raised motor tract. Hard to find something that could overtake it."

links.title: You: ""That's what..." (Rub your chin.) "..."
links.text: "That's what..." (Rub your chin.) "... a seven-litre V12?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Seven-point-two. Supercharged." Th..."
links.text: "Seven-point-two. Supercharged." The lieutenant is trying to suppress a smug smile. Unsuccessfully.

links.title: Empathy: "Saying these words brings him immen..."
links.text: Saying these words brings him immense joy.

links.title: You: ""It must be an advancement of the K..."
links.text: "It must be an advancement of the KR18GU engine on the older *Forty* models, right?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yeah, you know it?" The lieutenant..."
links.text: "Yeah, you know it?" The lieutenant seems surprised.

links.title: You: ""Just the basics. Cast-iron block,..."
links.text: "Just the basics. Cast-iron block, swirl-chamber-injection, dual-chains driving overhead camshafts, two valves per cylinder, hydraulic valve lash adjustment..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Uh... yes, that's right." He stare..."
links.text: "Uh... yes, that's right." He stares at you in surprise. "I am very impressed that you know these things."

links.title: You: ""No." (Nod sadly.) "I wish I did.""
links.text: "No." (Nod sadly.) "I wish I did."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay." The lieutenant nods too. "T..."
links.text: "Okay." The lieutenant nods too. "That's confusing. Can we get back to business now?"

links.title: You: "(Let out a whistle.) "Momma's servi..."
links.text: (Let out a whistle.) "Momma's serving some serious macaroni."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You lost me there." He is looking..."
links.text: "You lost me there." He is looking at you, perplexed.

links.title: You: ""Oh, I thought it would make more.""
links.text: "Oh, I thought it would make more."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Believe me," the lieutenant replie..."
links.text: "Believe me," the lieutenant replies -- sounding a little defensive -- "it's plenty enough. Kineema feels right at home on the raised motor tract. Hard to find something that could overtake it."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Harmel-Rioux 'Supersonique' -- a ra..."
links.text: Harmel-Rioux 'Supersonique' -- a racing motorbike for the road -- could probably do it.

links.title: You: ""What in there made the infernal wh..."
links.text: "What in there made the infernal whining sound that woke me?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You mean the coil noise?""
links.text: "You mean the coil noise?"

links.title: Interfacing: "Come on, you know how it works... p..."
links.text: Come on, you know how it works... put it together.

links.title: You: ""You mean when variable current pas..."
links.text: "You mean when variable current passes through the coils on the electrical systems and the varying magnetic fields around them..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He stares at you, intrigued."
links.text: He stares at you, intrigued.

links.title: Authority: "This is your chance to impress the..."
links.text: This is your chance to impress the lieutenant!

links.title: You: ""It causes vibration in the wires a..."
links.text: "It causes vibration in the wires and as the frequency of the current happens to fall within the audible range"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The resulting vibration creates th..."
links.text: "The resulting vibration creates the whining sound, that's right," the lieutenant finishes your sentence. "Very impressive."

links.title: Empathy: "There's respect in that curious loo..."
links.text: There's respect in that curious look. Definitely.

links.title: You: ""... the wires go *bweeeeeeeeee* an..."
links.text: "... the wires go *bweeeeeeeeee* and then *neeeeeeeow*?" (Loudly imitate the sounds.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Basically, yes -- although it's mo..."
links.text: "Basically, yes -- although it's mostly about frequency range, not the wires making *bwee-*sounds. Still -- I'm impressed."

links.title: You: ""What is 'coil noise'?""
links.text: "What is 'coil noise'?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""When variable current passes throu..."
links.text: "When variable current passes through wires that make up the coils on the electrical systems on this machine -- it causes vibration in the wires and the cores of the coils."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""When the frequency of the current..."
links.text: "When the frequency of the current in the coils falls within the audible range  the resulting vibration creates the *whiny sound* you mentioned."

links.title: Physical Instrument: "What a binoclard!"
links.text: What a binoclard!

links.title: Suggestion: "Whatever you do, don't make fun of..."
links.text: Whatever you do, don't make fun of the lieutenant for explaining this to you.

links.title: You: ""You are such a binoclard, Kim.""
links.text: "You are such a binoclard, Kim."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I am not a *binoclard*, I am a dri..."
links.text: "I am not a *binoclard*, I am a driver... and a police lieutenant."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Poor choice of words. Lieutenant Ki..."
links.text: Poor choice of words. Lieutenant Kitsuragi obviously doesn't want to be a *binoclard*.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Binoclard... binoclard..." he repe..."
links.text: "Binoclard... binoclard..." he repeats to himself, eyes fixed on the ground.

links.title: Empathy: "Whatever high-school bullying memor..."
links.text: Whatever high-school bullying memories you woke in your colleague, he doesn't enjoy them.

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry. I don't even know what..."
links.text: "I'm sorry. I don't even know what it means. It just popped into my head."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Maybe don't blurt out everything t..."
links.text: "Maybe don't blurt out everything that *pops into your head*. Just some friendly advice. Anyway..."

links.title: You: ""Speak up, *four-eyes*, I can't hea..."
links.text: "Speak up, *four-eyes*, I can't hear you!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm perfectly proud of my glasses...."
links.text: "I'm perfectly proud of my glasses." The lieutenant adjusts his spectacles. "I need them for seeing. Anyway..."

links.title: You: ""Wow... how do you know all that?""
links.text: "Wow... how do you know all that?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I have pretty much maintained my v..."
links.text: "I have pretty much maintained my vehicles by myself ever since one was assigned to me. You inevitably pick up some knowledge on the way."

links.title: Empathy: "There's pride in there. A trained d..."
links.text: There's pride in there. A trained driver, *knows* his ride.

links.title: You: ""Mhmh, that's exactly what I though..."
links.text: "Mhmh, that's exactly what I thought."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Of course..." His gaze wanders ove..."
links.text: "Of course..." His gaze wanders over your face.

links.title: Drama: "The human lie-detector."
links.text: The human lie-detector.

links.title: You: ""A fine machine..." (Run your hand..."
links.text: "A fine machine..." (Run your hand over the smooth metal surface.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Don't leave fingerprints on the bo..."
links.text: "Don't leave fingerprints on the bodywork, I just had it polished."

links.title: Empathy: "Wow... he's not happy you called hi..."
links.text: Wow... he's not happy you called him a binoclard. He'll get over it.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes." There's gentleness in the li..."
links.text: "Yes." There's gentleness in the lieutenant's voice as his eyes run over the vehicle's contours. "An extraordinary machine."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "It's nice and all, but why so modes..."
links.text: It's nice and all, but why so modest? Put some zing into it. Flare it up. Slam it down!

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Helium headlights would improve the..."
links.text: Helium headlights would improve the range and quality of the visual field a lot.

links.title: Authority: "It's a bit *girly* right now. Fit i..."
links.text: It's a bit *girly* right now. Fit it with some proper off-road components.

links.title: You: ""You need to *slam* it, Kim. Make i..."
links.text: "You need to *slam* it, Kim. Make it more imposing."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Sorry, I'm not following you?""
links.text: "Sorry, I'm not following you?"

links.title: Interfacing: "Lingo it up."
links.text: Lingo it up.

links.title: You: ""Drop the ride *two hundo mill*, ge..."
links.text: "Drop the ride *two hundo mill*, get the camber to frosty-frosty minuses..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, that's... *porno*-tuning.""
links.text: "No, that's... *porno*-tuning."

links.title: Half Light: "USE BIGGER WORDS!!!"
links.text: USE BIGGER WORDS!!!

links.title: You: ""Wait, what about the spinners then..."
links.text: "Wait, what about the spinners then, huh?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Those spinners were elegant, sleek..."
links.text: "Those spinners were elegant, sleek..." He pauses, looking for words. "Radiant, even. What you're suggesting is *porno*."

links.title: You: ""It needs a *MASSIVE* aero-kit and..."
links.text: "It needs a *MASSIVE* aero-kit and *GARGANTUAN* roof-mounted..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Porno. That's short for pornograph..."
links.text: "Porno. That's short for pornography."

links.title: Conceptualization: "The sole purpose of 'pornography' i..."
links.text: The sole purpose of 'pornography' is to stimulate one's visual sense to evoke sexual arousal -- the same is true with the modifications you're proposing.

links.title: You: ""So? What's wrong with pornography?""
links.text: "So? What's wrong with pornography?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's a negative on the porno. Th..."
links.text: "That's a negative on the porno. Thank you, though."

links.title: Volition: "No one in the history of conviction..."
links.text: No one in the history of convictions has been more sure of *anything*.

links.title: You: ""Pornograpy is something completely..."
links.text: "Pornograpy is something completely different, Kim."

links.title: You: ""Alright, I guess it did get a bit..."
links.text: "Alright, I guess it did get a bit porny there."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm sincerely relieved I don't hav..."
links.text: "I'm sincerely relieved I don't have to try and convince you of that." He glances at his vehicle. "Back to work?"

links.title: You: ""Trust me, it's cool.""
links.text: "Trust me, it's cool."

links.title: You: ""It's what?""
links.text: "It's what?"

links.title: You: ""I'm not either. Don't know why I s..."
links.text: "I'm not either. Don't know why I said that."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well," the lieutenant says, frowni..."
links.text: "Well," the lieutenant says, frowning ever so slightly, "maybe don't just say every little thing in your head out loud. It confuses people."

links.title: You: ""Ever thought about switching to he..."
links.text: "Ever thought about switching to helium headlights?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Actually, I have a pair at home --..."
links.text: "Actually, I have a pair at home -- just haven't gotten around to fitting them yet. I need to lay some wiring for the ballasts first..."

links.title: You: ""If we ever get this case solved, m..."
links.text: "If we ever get this case solved, maybe we can do it together?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You want to help?" He glances at y..."
links.text: "You want to help?" He glances at you and smiles. "Thank you for the offer. That might be fun. Let's do the case first though, alright?"

links.title: Rhetoric: "He liked the idea."
links.text: He liked the idea.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh..." The lieutenant rubs the bac..."
links.text: "Oh..." The lieutenant rubs the back of his head. "Yes, let's definitely *think* about it."

links.title: Drama: "He is not enthused about the idea."
links.text: He is not enthused about the idea.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Maybe," he replies with an apologe..."
links.text: "Maybe," he replies with an apologetic smile and nods. "Yes, definitely maybe."

links.title: Rhetoric: "... and means *no*."
links.text: ... and means *no*.

links.title: You: ""Sounds like a hassle, but good luc..."
links.text: "Sounds like a hassle, but good luck."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Thanks." The lieutenant smiles. "A..."
links.text: "Thanks." The lieutenant smiles. "Are we done here?"

links.title: You: ""With a winch and mud tyres we coul..."
links.text: "With a winch and mud tyres we could take it off the beaten path, Kim."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We are not going to though, becaus..."
links.text: "We are not going to though, because this is clearly a *sports* motor carriage." Sounds like he has a strong concept of what this machine is.

links.title: You: ""Okay, enough about the details.""
links.text: "Okay, enough about the details."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Anything else?""
links.text: "Anything else?"

links.title: You: ""Okay, let's move." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Okay, let's move." [Leave.]

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hang on, you're telling me you rem..."
links.text: "Hang on, you're telling me you remember all these little mechanical details, but you have trouble remembering your name?"

links.title: You: ""I might not know much, but I *do*..."
links.text: "I might not know much, but I *do* know I like motor carriages -- must be a subconscious thing."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Strange... but plausible, I guess...."
links.text: "Strange... but plausible, I guess." He gives you a quick side-glance and turns to go. "I guess you're a bit of a... torque dork too."

links.title: Empathy: "He seems to like the idea."
links.text: He seems to like the idea.

links.title: You: ""It's strange, I know. I don't even..."
links.text: "It's strange, I know. I don't even like motor carriages that much."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Right," the lieutenant marks dryly..."
links.text: "Right," the lieutenant marks dryly. "Speed isn't for everyone."

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "What?! Speed isn't for...?! Oh... h..."
links.text: What?! Speed isn't for...?! Oh... he means velocity. Yeah, that's definitely an acquired taste.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "What?! Speed most definitely *is* f..."
links.text: What?! Speed most definitely *is* for... Oh... he means velocity. Can't really get properly high on that so... Nevermind.

links.title: You: ""I don't like your machine, lieuten..."
links.text: "I don't like your machine, lieutenant. Looks impractical."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mhmh..." the lieutenant huffs. "No..."
links.text: "Mhmh..." the lieutenant huffs. "No point in stopping then."

links.title: You: ""I'd still like to take a close loo..."
links.text: "I'd still like to take a close look."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Sure, go ahead.""
links.text: "Sure, go ahead."

links.title: You: ""Agreed, let's keep moving." [Finis..."
links.text: "Agreed, let's keep moving." [Finish thought.]

links.title: You: "(Shrug.) "A motor carriage. One of..."
links.text: (Shrug.) "A motor carriage. One of many."

links.title: You: "Actually motor carriages don't inte..."
links.text: Actually motor carriages don't interest me. [Finish thought.]

links.title: You: ""No time for this, gotta run." [Fin..."
links.text: "No time for this, gotta run." [Finish thought.]

dialogueTree.title: Interfacing: "Snow covers the white-on-blue polic..."
dialogueTree.text: Snow covers the white-on-blue police livery of the motor carriage. The white colours nearly meld together.

dialogueTree.title: Interfacing: "The surrounding blaze of the electr..."
dialogueTree.text: The surrounding blaze of the electric lights makes the white-on-blue police livery of the motor carriage seem beautifully ominous.

dialogueTree.title: Interfacing: "The afternoon sun shimmers off the..."
dialogueTree.text: The afternoon sun shimmers off the white-on-blue police livery of the motor carriage.

dialogueTree.title: Interfacing: "In the morning light the white-on-b..."
dialogueTree.text: In the morning light the white-on-blue police livery on the motor carriage cannot but catch your eye.

dialogueTree.title: Interfacing: "A motor carriage in white-on-blue p..."
dialogueTree.text: A motor carriage in white-on-blue police livery.
